data.title: Micro Focus
data.meta_description: Micro Focus is now a part of OpenText
data.text:
In 2023, OpenText™ acquired Micro Focus™, a global software leader in enterprise digital transformation since 1976.

Micro Focus products now enhance the OpenText AI Cloud, OpenText DevOps Cloud and OpenText Cybersecurity Cloud. Additionally, the Micro Focus products have broadened our offerings to include OpenText DevOps Cloud, OpenText IT Operations Cloud, and Portfolio.
